column4: killgore: places ---> satadrive ---> it says it has no permissions
killgore: cannot display folder content... no permission...
killgore: and via "comuter" it looks as its empty... and has a red X on it...
killgore: also its only 1 of the 2 hdd... i got an additional IDE hdd...
killgore: isnt there a way to ubunto to find which drives i have and auto load them?
<winks> can someone throw me a rope here... im lost...
what are you having problems with?
you can read files without problems, but writing to NTFS is not recommended.
i cannot see my hdds on "comuter"
i got at 1.8ghz cpu nd it shows 1.ghz... (though it says its an athlon 3000+ and not athlon64)...
speakers plugged in and turned on?
mplayer will give you that information if you launch it from console.
